name: Foxy Family
description:
Foxy Family

The fox Says : Recently this young cub started following me around. He copies every single move I make, down to my double jump.
Will the Big fox protects the cub from the traps by hunters, will the fox leaves him behind if gate comes  ? or will he saves the cub, by opening the gates by jumping over switches.

Yea, Play as the FOX and have a nice journey. Avoid Spikes and protect cub from the spikes and make sure the cub also reaches portal safely.

Controls:

  • Left  Arrow key : Left Movement
  • Right Arrow Key : Right Movement
  • Up Arrow  key: Jumping
  • Up Arrow  key two times: Double Jumping
